wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==April==
* '''[[7 April|7]]''' - Actor [[Ismael Cruz Córdova]] is born.
* '''[[23 April|23]]''' - ''[[Pictures under Discussion]]'' is published.
==July==
* '''[[24 July|24]]-[[27 July|27]]''' - [[Mythcon 18]].
* ''' [[25 July|25]] [[Christopher Wiseman]] dies.'''
==August==
* '''[[27 August|27]] - ''[[The Lost Road and Other Writings]]'' is published in the UK.'''
* '''[[28 August|28]]''' - Actor [[John Huston]] dies.

==September==
* '''[[25 September|25]]-[[27 September|27]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1987]].
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 24|''Mallorn'' 24]] is published.

==October==
* '''[[8 October|8]]''' - [[Roger Lancelyn Green]], [[Inklings|Inkling]] and biographer, dies.
* '''[[15 October|15]]-[[16 October|16]]''' - The [[Wikipedia:Great Storm of 1987|Great Storm]], which had been "[[The Notion Club Papers#Trivia|predicted]]" by Tolkien in a curious coincidence; in ''[[The Notion Club Papers]]'' (written in [[1945]]) Tolkien mentions a Great Storm on Thursday, June 12 of 1987, which however actually occurs during October.

==November==
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - ''[[The Lost Road and Other Writings]]'' is published in the US.
==December==
* '''[[24 December|24]]''' - [[Terence Tiller]], writer of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series)|1955 radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings]]'', dies.
==?==
* '''?''' - [[Mithril Miniatures]] is founded.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Tale of Gondolin]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[Gates of Mordor (book)]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Lords of Middle-earth: Vol. II]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Pirates of Pelargir]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Woses of the Black Wood]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Rivendell: The House of Elrond]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Havens of Gondor]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Ents of Fangorn]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Dunland and the Southern Misty Mountains]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Lost Realm of Cardolan]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Assassins of Dol Amroth]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Weathertop: Tower of the Wind]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[The 1988 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[Douglas A. Anderson]], in cooperation with [[Christopher Tolkien]], suggests to [[Houghton Mifflin]] to synchronise its [[1966]] edition of ''The Lord of the Rings'' with the more up-to-date British edition, and encourages for more potential corrections.
* '''?''' - [[The Adventures of Frodo]] is released.
